channel.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
channel.description: Ok glitch when you switch from dds to a higher or lower strength weapon it hits higher on second spec, it would be great if someone knew a fix :D

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @pyro_sauce pyro sauce
item.description:
@pyro_sauce wrote:

nope i still dont get it… anyone got any direct code? and no sarcasm or facepalms or whatever the fuck you guys do because i’m tired and just not inthe mood. I just had to write 3 more essays and im fuckin tired and out of it atm

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:9, topic:376922”]Wield handler if player is currently doing attack anim, save the wield action, and execute it after attack anim is finished (also add an attribute to the wielder that stops them from requesting the wield action again)

Attack anims are 2 RS ticks long[/quote]

thanks worked like a charm

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

this is a very common glitch it happens when you use one weapon then switch to another weapon while specing, change the time of weapon switching, then your problem will be fixed

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Wield handler if player is currently doing attack anim, save the wield action, and execute it after attack anim is finished (also add an attribute to the wielder that stops them from requesting the wield action again)

Attack anims are 2 RS ticks long

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Ironclad722 Ironclad722
item.description:
@Ironclad722 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’s easy to Google to learn how to use return statements/if statements.
Nothing aforementioned is complicated. It consisted of less than 10 lines (excluding the item data of course)[/quote]
No offense vain, but some people might think its a bit too complicated based on there knowledge of java, I can do every thing you just said there, I’m experienced and all that but not all people are. But uh, maybe try explaining it a bit?

And vain is right, the timer worked for me. It basically relies on how you add it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @pyro_sauce pyro sauce
item.description:
@pyro_sauce wrote:

I Vain I:

I know how to cook the meat, though you may not be a chef. I will message you a brief tutorial tomorrow.

Thank you =]
oh and bonus points for sucessfully continuing on that annalogy
Or was it a metaphore…similie? Nah I’m pretty sure its a annalogy… But dont take my word for it; I’m running on 3 hrs sleep total so far this week bcuz of that stupid freakin critical essay that I have to write. I’m like 70% done nos though and its not due till friday anyway so now I can finally get some sleep… Woah wait did I just type that? i meant to think it… And where the hell did that purple girraffe come from… And why’s it speaking in spanish to that orange koala…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @pyro_sauce pyro sauce
item.description:
@pyro_sauce wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’s easy to Google to learn how to use return statements/if statements.
Nothing aforementioned is complicated. It consisted of less than 10 lines (excluding the item data of course)[/quote]
I’ve taken quite a few classes on java and I still have no fucking idea how to do what you are advising. You were just vague enough to baffle me… And I’m not all that bad… What you said there is like if you asked me how to make tacos from scratch and I just assummed you would have the supplies or knew were to get them(which is reasonable) and then just said 'well you cook the meat and then you put all the stuff together in the right order. You still dont know HOW to cook the meat or what the order is.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @pyro_sauce pyro sauce
item.description:
@pyro_sauce wrote:

Well jesus christ thats more complicated than I expected. You cant honestly expect these people to know that much about java. It’s okay to do a LITTLE spoon feeding in the help section; I mean, if they post in the help section either they are tired or they dont know all that much about java. I mean its safe to assume they know what an int or a boolean is but If they knew how to do what you are advising them to do they would have thought of it themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DDS Glitch
item.dc:creator: @pyro_sauce pyro sauce
item.description:
@pyro_sauce wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=pyro sauce link=topic=472838.msg3458856#msg3458856 date=1294283767]

Topic like this has been posted already, anyway, add a timer.

dont listen to him i tried timer; does nothing useful because its too easy to get around… and it frustrates the fuck out of me. its not about timing its about str bonus and max hit
[/quote]You obviously did it wrong.[/quote]
Well how did you do it then?
And even if i did do it wrong and your way does work it still is inneficient and there is a way to make combat as a whole better. However you would end up having to redo the whole special attack part of the combat system just to make it work… But still… Yea idk where im going with this…
So hiw did you add your timer?
